Text: Thanks, but I can't get the files to work. It's impossible to unpack them because the program says it's the wrong file.

You need a program like, CDisplay. It's made to view these kinds of files, I do believe however that you can change to file type to .rar if you want to unzip the pics the normal way.

http://download.cnet.com/CDisplay-Image-Display/3000-18488_4-10162238.html

That's a download for CDisplay, it's what I use.
